testcase.classname: Search Products and Verify Cart After Login
testcase.name: Test Case 20
testcase.system-out: Given User is on automation page............................................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed Then User clicks on 'Products' button to see products.......................passed Then Verify user is navigated to ALL PRODUCTS page successfully.............passed Then Verify 'SEARCHED PRODUCT' input box is visible.........................passed Then Verify all the products related to search are visible..................passed Then User adds those products to cart.......................................passed Then User clicks 'Cart' button and verify that products are visible in cart.passed Then User Click 'Signup / Login' button and submit login details............passed Then User again goes to Cart page...........................................passed Then Verify that those products are visible in cart after login as well.....passed
